Verses: 1 seeriyarukkum Isravelarukkum Moondru Varusham Yuththamillaamalirundhadhu.
2 moondraam Varushaththile Yoodhaavin Raajaavaagiya Yosabaadh Isravelin Raajaavinidaththirkup Poyirukkum Podhu,

3 isravelin Raajaa Than Oozhiyakkaararai Nokki: Keeleyaaththilulla Raamodh Nammudaiyadhendru Ariyeergalaa? Naam Adhai Seeriyaa Raajaavin Kaiyilirundhu Pidiththukkollaamal, Summaayiruppaanen Endru Solli,

4 yosabaaththai Nokki: Keeleyaaththilulla Raamoththinmel Yuththampanna Ennodekooda Varugireeraa Endru Kettaan. Yosabaadh Isravelin Raajaavai Nokki: Naandhaan Neer, Ennudaiya Janangal Ummudaiya Janangal, Ennudaiya Kudhiraigal Ummudaiya Kudhiraigal Endraan.
5 pinnum Yosabaadh Isravelin Raajaavaip Paarththu: Karththarudaiya Vaarththaiyai Indraikku Visaariththu Ariyum Endraan.

6 appozhudhu Isravelin Raajaa Erakkuraiya Naanooru Theerkkadharisigalaik Koodivarachcheydhu: Naan Keeleyaaththilulla Raamoththinmel Yuththampannappogalaamaa, Pogalaagaadhaa Endru Avargalaik Kettadharku; Avargal, Pom, Aandavar Raajaavin Kaiyil Oppukkoduppaar Endraargal.
7 pinbu Yosabaadh: Naam Visaariththu Arigiradharku Ivargalaiyallaamal Karththarudaiya Theerkkadharisi Vere Yaaraagilum Inge Illaiyaa Endru Kettaan.

8 appozhudhu Isravelin Raajaa, Yosabaaththai Nokki: Karththaridaththil Visaariththu Arigiradharku Imlaavin Kumaaranaagiya Migaayaa Ennum Innum Oruvan Irukkiraan; Aanaalum Naan Avanaip Pagaikkiren; Avan Ennaik Kuriththu Nanmaiyaaga Alla, Theemaiyaagave Theerkkadharisananchollugiravan Endraan. Adharku Yosabaadh, Raajaave, Appadi Sollavendaam Endraan.
9 appozhudhu Isravelin Raajaa Pradhaanigalil Oruvanaik Kooppittu: Imlaavin Kumaaranaagiya Migaayaavai Seekkiramaai Azhaiththuvaa Endraan.

10 isravelin Raajaavum, Yoodhaavin Raajaavaagiya Yosabaaththum, Samaariyaavin Olimugavaasalukku Munnirukkum Visaalaththile Raajavasthiram Thariththukkondavargalaai, Avaravar Thamtham Singaasanaththil Utkaarndhirundhaargal; Sagala Theerkkadharisigalum Avargalukku Munbaagath Theerkkadharisananchonnaargal.
11 kenaanaavin Kumaaranaagiya Sidhekkiyaa Thanakku Iruppukkombugalai Undaakki, Ivaigalaal Neer Seeriyarai Mutti Nirmoolamaakkip Poduveer Endru Karththarsollugiraar Endraan.
12 sagala Theerkkadharisigalum Adharku Isaivaagath Theerkkadharisanam Solli, Keeleyaaththilulla Raamoththukkuppom, Umakku Vaaikkum; Karththar Adhai Raajaavin Kaiyil Oppukkoduppaar Endraargal.

13 migaayaavai Azhaikkappona Aal Avanudan Pesi: Idho, Theerkkadharisigaludaiya Vaarththaigal Egavaakkaai Raajaavukku Nanmaiyaayirukkiradhu; Ummudaiya Vaarththaiyum Avargalil Oruvar Vaarththaiyaippola Irukkumpadi Nanmaiyaaga Sollum Endraan.
14 adharku Migaayaa: Karththar Ennidaththil Solvadhaiye Solluven Endru Karththarudaiya Jeevanaikkondu Sollugiren Endraan.

15 avan Raajaavinidaththil Vandhapodhu, Raajaa Avanaip Paarththu: Migaayaave, Naangal Keeleyaaththilulla Raamoththinmel Yuththampannappogalaamaa, Pogalaagaadhaa Endru Kettaan. Adharku Avan: pom, Umakku Vaaikkum; Karththar Adhai Raajaavinkaiyil Oppukkoduppaar Endraan.
16 raajaa Avanaip Paarththu: Nee Karththarudaiya Naamaththile Unmaiyai Allaamal Verondraiyum Ennidaththil Sollaadhapadikku, Naan Eththanaidharam Unnai Aanaiyiduvikkavendum Endru Sonnaan.

17 appozhudhu Avan: Isravelarellaarum Meyppan Illaadha Aadugalaippola Malaigalile Sidharappattadhaik Kanden; Appozhudhu Karththar: Ivargalukku Ejamaan Illai; Avaravar Tham Tham Veettirku Samaadhaanaththode Thirumbakkadavargal Endraar Endru Sonnaan.
18 appozhudhu Isravelin Raajaa Yosabaaththai Nokki: Ivan Ennaik Kuriththu Nanmaiyaaga Alla, Theemaiyaagave Theerkkadharisanam Sollugiravan Endru Naan Ummode Sollavillaiyaa Endraan.

19 appozhudhu Avan Sonnadhu: Karththarudaiya Vaarththaiyaik Kelum; Karththar Thammudaiya Singaasanaththin Mel Veetrirukkiradhaiyum, Paramasenaiyellaam Avaridam Avar Valadhupakkaththilum Avar Idadhupakkaththilum Nirkiradhaiyum Kanden.
20 appozhudhu Karththar: Aagaab Poi, Keeleyaaththilulla Raamoththil Vizhumpadikku, Avanukkup Podhanai Seygiravan Yaar Endru Kettadharku, Oruvan Ippadiyum Oruvan Appadiyum Sonnaargal.
21 appozhudhu Oru Aavi Purappattu Vandhu, Karththarukku Munbaaga Nindru: Naan Avanukkup Podhanai Seyven Endradhu.

22 edhinaal Endru Karththar Adhaik Kettaar. Appozhudhu Adhu: Naan Poi, Avanudaiya Theerkkadharisigal Ellaarin Vaayilum Poiyin Aaviyaai Iruppen Endradhu. Adharku Avar: Nee Avanukkup Podhanaiseydhu Appadi Nadakkappannuvaai; Poi Appadi Sey Endraar.
23 aadhalaal Karththar Poiyin Aaviyai Indha Ummudaiya Theerkkadharisigalaagiya Ivargal Ellaarudaiya Vaayilum Kattalaiyittaar; Karththar Ummaik Kuriththuth Theemaiyaaga Sonnaar Endraan.
24 appozhudhu Kenaanaavin Kumaaranaagiya Sidhekkiyaa Kittevandhu, Migaayaavaik Kannaththil Adiththu, Karththarudaiya Aavi Endhavazhiyaai Ennaivittu Unnode Pesumpadi Vandhadhu Endraan.
25 adharku Migaayaa: Nee Oliththukkolla Ullaraiyile Padhungum Annaalile Adhaik Kaanbaai Endraan.
26 appozhudhu Isravelin Raajaa: Migaayaavaip Pidiththu, Avanaip Pattanaththuth Thalaivanaagiya Aamonidaththirkum, Raajaavin Kumaaranaagiya Yovaasidaththirkum Thirumbak Kondu Poi,

27 ivanai Siraichchaalaiyile Vaiththu, Naan Samaadhaanaththode Varumalavum, Ivanukku Idukkaththin Appaththaiyum Idukkaththin Thanneeraiyum Saappidakkodungal Endru Raajaa Sonnaar Endru Sollungal Endraan.
28 appozhudhu Migaayaa: Neer Samaadhaanaththode Thirumbivarugiradhu Undaanaal, Karththar Ennaik Kondu Pesinadhillai Endru Solli; Janangale, Neengal Ellaarum Idhaik Kelungal Endraan.
29 pinbu Isravelin Raajaavum, Yoodhaavin Raajaavaagiya Yosabaaththum Keeleyaaththilulla Raamoththukkup Ponaargal.
30 isravelin Raajaa Yosabaaththai Nokki: Naan Veshammaari Yuththaththil Pravesippen; Neero Raajavasthiram Thariththirum Endru Solli, Isravelin Raajaa Veshammaari, Yuththaththil Pravesiththaan.

31 seeriyaavin Raajaa Thanakku Irukkira Radhangalin Muppaththirandu Thalaivaraiyum Nokki: Neengal Siriyavarodum Periyavarodum Yuththampannaamal Isravelin Raajaa Oruvanodemaaththiram Yuththampannungal Endru Kattalaiyittirundhaan.
32 aadhalaal Radhangalin Thalaivar Yosabaaththaik Kaangaiyil, Ivan Dhaan Isravelin Raajaa Endru Solli Yuththampanna Avanukku Neraaga Saaindhuvandhaargal; Appozhudhu Yosabaadh Kookkuralittaan.
33 ivan Isravelin Raajaa Alla Endru Radhangalin Thalaivar Kandu Avanaivittu, Vilagipponaargal.

34 oruvan Ninaiyaamal Villai Naanetri Eydhaan; Adhu Isravelin Raajaavinudaiya Kavasaththin Sandhugalukkul Pattadhu; Appozhudhu Avan Than Saaradhiyaip Paarththu: Nee Thiruppi Ennai Raanuvaththukkappaal Kondupo; Enakkuk Kaayampattadhu Endraan.

35 andraiyadhinam Yuththam Adhigariththadhu; Raajaavai Seeriyarukku Edhiraaga Radhaththil Niruththivaiththaargal; Saayankaalaththile Avan Irandhuponaan; Kaayaththin Raththam Radhaththin Thattile Vadindhadhu.
36 pozhudhupogumpodhu Avaravar Thamtham Pattanaththirkum, Avaravar Tham Tham Dhesaththirkum Pogalaam Endru Raanuvaththil Paraisaatrappattadhu.
37 appadiye Raajaa Irandhapinpu, Samaariyaavukkuk Konduvarappattaan; Raajaavai Samaariyaavil Adakkampanninaargal.
38 andha Radhaththaiyum Avanudaiya Kavasaththaiyum Samaariyaavin Kulaththile Kazhuvugirapodhu, Karththar Solliyirundha Vaarththaiyinpadiye, Naaigal Avan Raththaththai Nakkinadhu.

39 aagaabin Matra Varththamaanangalum, Avan Seydhavai Yaavum, Avan Kattina Thandha Aramanaiyin Varalaarum, Avan Kattina Ellaap Pattanangalin Varalaarum Isravel Raajaakkalin Naalaagamap Pusthagaththil Allavo Ezhudhiyirukkiradhu.
40 aagaab Than Pidhaakkalode Niththiraiyadaindhapin, Avan Kumaaranaagiya Agasiyaa Avan Sthalaththil Raajaavaanaan.
41 aasaavin Kumaaranaagiya Yosabaadh Isravelin Raajaavaagiya Aagaabin Naalaam Varushaththil Yoodhaavinmel Raajaavaanaan.
42 yosabaadh Raajaavaagirapodhu Muppaththaindhu Vayadhaayirundhu, Irubaththaindhu Varusham Erusalemil Raajyabaarampanninaan; Silkiyin Kumaaraththiyaagiya Avanudaiya Thaayin Per Asubaal.

43 avan Than Thagappanaagiya Aasaavin Vazhigalilellaam Nadandhaan; Avan Adhai Vittu Vilagaamal Karththarin Paarvaikku Semmaiyaanadhai Seydhaan; Aagilum Medaigal Thagarkkappadavillai; Janangal Innum Medaigalinmel Paliyittuth Thoobankaattivandhaargal.
44 yosabaadh Isravelin Raajaavode Samaadhaanamaayirundhaan.
45 yosabaaththin Matra Varththamaanangalum, Avan Kaattiya Vallamaiyum, Avan Pannina Yuththamum, Yoodhaavudaiya Raajaakkalin Naalaagamap Pusthagaththil Allavo Ezhudhiyirukkiradhu.
46 than Thagappanaagiya Aasaavin Naatkalil Meedhiyaai Vittirundha Lachchaiyaana Punarchchikkaararaiyum Avan Dhesaththilirundhu Atruppogappanninaan.
47 appozhudhu Edhomil Raajaa Illai; Pradhiraajaa Oruvan Irundhaan.
48 ponnukkaaga Oppeerukkup Pogumpadi, Yosabaath Tharshees Kappalgalai Seydhaan; Aanaal Avaigal Pogavillai; Avaigal Esiyonkeberile Udaindhupoyina.
49 appozhudhu Aagaabin Kumaaranaagiya Agasiyaa Yosabaaththai Nokki: En Velaikkaarar Ummudaiya Velaikkaararodunkoodak Kappalgalile Pogattum Endraan; Adharku Yosabaadh Sammadhikkavillai.
50 yosabaath Than Pidhaakkalode Niththiraiyadaindhu, Dhaaveedhin Nagaraththile Than Pidhaakkalode Adakkampannappattaan; Avan Kumaaranaagiya Yoraam Avan Sthaanaththil Raajaavaanaan.
51 aagaabin Kumaaranaagiya Agasiyaa Yoodhaavin Raajaavaagiya Yosabaaththin Padhinezhaam Varushaththile Samaariyaavil Raajaavaagi, Isravelinmel Irandu Varusham Raajyabaarampanni,
52 karththarin Paarvaikkup Pollaappaanadhai Seydhu, Than Thagappan Vazhiyilum, Than Thaayin Vazhiyilum, Isravelaip Paavancheyyappannina Nebaaththin Kumaaran Yerobeyaamin Vazhiyilum Nadandhu,
53 paagaalai Seviththu, Avanaip Panindhukondu, Than Thagappan Seydhapadiyellaam Isravelin Dhevanaagiya Karththarukkuk Kobamundaakkinaan.
